questions.question: You attended an event. Write an article for your blog.

answers.answer: Great event, when sport met charity!
Twoo weeks ago I participated to a marathon finswimming.
Into 12 hours we had to make a maximum of lenght of the swimming pool.
Each participant had to run 4 lenght at least. With our team we succeed to swam more than 43 km.
For each kilometer we had swam adapted diving received Euros.
So thanks our efforts we helped an association.
It's diving for people with disabilities. We have now in Belgium a blind who is making apnea.
